title: Death flight 901: the Erebus disaster
creator_credit: John Keir, New Zealand Broadcasting Corporation and Sonar Productions
brief_description: A film about the Air New Zealand DC10 plane crash at Mt Erebus in Antarctica on November 28, 1979 and the judicial process of apportioning blame. Includes footage of the wreckage and sequences filmed inside the courtroom at the Royal Commission of Inquiry.
creator_credit_for_label: John Keir, New Zealand Broadcasting Corporation and Sonar Productions
